title: Horseshoe crabs are really relatives of spiders, scorpions

title_detail.value: Horseshoe crabs are really relatives of spiders, scorpions

summary: By analyzing troves of genetic data and considering a vast number of possible ways to examine it, scientists now have a high degree of confidence that horseshoe crabs do indeed belong within the arachnids.

summary_detail.value: By analyzing troves of genetic data and considering a vast number of possible ways to examine it, scientists now have a high degree of confidence that horseshoe crabs do indeed belong within the arachnids.
